name: big-mushroom
short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 2500 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 5000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A rare mushroom that would sell at a high price.
flavor_text.emerald: A rare mushroom that would sell at a high price.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A large and rare mushroom. It is very popular among certain people.
